definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
see 網絡水軍|网络水军[Wang3 luo4 shui3 jun1]

sentences.english: She resembles her mother in the way she moves her hands when she talks.
sentences.chinese: 她说话时打手势的动作像她妈妈。

sentences.english: He's a good puncher but we're not going to stand in front of this guy and exchange with him.
sentences.chinese: 他是个优秀的打手，但我们将不会和他正面对攻的。

sentences.english: And they made signs to his father, how he would have him called.
sentences.chinese: 他们就向他父亲打手式，问他要叫这孩子什么名字。

sentences.english: Jabba's enforcers were no match for a group of determined Rebels led by a Jedi Knight.
sentences.chinese: 贾巴的打手无法与绝地武士领导的顽强义军相匹敌。

sentences.english: We gesture because it’s part of our lexicon.
sentences.chinese: 我们打手势是因为它是我们语言的一部分。

sentences.english: Do you have free throw for hacking in half-court game?
sentences.chinese: 你们打半场打手犯规罚球吗？

sentences.english: Of course, I’d still feel silly gesturing with my hands.
sentences.chinese: 当然，当我打手势时我还是会觉得很傻。

sentences.english: He with his hatchet men swaggered out of the bar.
sentences.chinese: 他和他那帮打手神气活现地走出了那间酒吧。

sentences.english: Talent goon who is not in luck by named.
sentences.chinese: 被称为“不走运的天才打手”。

sentences.english: I always try to show some sign.
sentences.chinese: 我一直想发出一些信号或打手势。

sentences.english: Water Margin is very interesting description of the preceding paragraphs, highlighting the true nature of Li Kui's thugs.
sentences.chinese: 水浒上几段描写很有意思，凸现李逵的打手本色。
警察打手势让我们通过。

sentences.english: Ok, please go back and repeat the flag signal.
sentences.chinese: 好的，请你回去再做一个打手出界旗示。

sentences.english: The director motioned to me to come forward.
sentences.chinese: 经理打手势要我走向前。

sentences.english: He motioned the man in, all the while talking.
sentences.chinese: 他边说话边打手势让这人进来。

sentences.english: She was signaling to the children to stay outside.
sentences.chinese: 她在向孩子们打手势，要他们留在外面。

definition: dog's leg/fig. one who follows a villain/henchman/hired thug
variant of 嘍囉|喽啰[lou2 luo5]
under one's control or administration/subordinates/(money etc) on hand/sb's financial means/to take action
